3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to your charming cottage craftsman in the heart of Sacramento! This meticulously renovated home offers a perfect blend of modern convenience & classic charm. Boasting 2 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, ~1,100sqft on a 5,227sqft lot. 1 car garage detached. This home features a thoughtfully designed layout, a large living room & separate dining area, all combine to create an inviting space for both relaxing & entertaining. Upgrades EVERYWHERE, but you'll have your socks knocked off in the tasteful kitchen. Natural light floods every corner with large NEW windows throughout. The spacious master suite is extra wide for a king bed, it is complete with a luxurious walk-in shower & ample closet space. Outside, the delightful yard awaits, perfect for enjoying the California sunshine. New covered front patio, & beautiful decking out back. Parking is a breeze w/ many off-street spaces. Situated on a serene tree lined street, you'll enjoy peaceful living while still being just moments away from the bustling energy of downtown & midtown Sacramento. Plus, easy access to major highways, 80, 99, 50, makes commuting a breeze. Explore the vibrant Oak Park neighborhood, with its eclectic mix of shops & eateries. Walkable to UC Davis Medical Center, highly desirable location!
Confidential Remarks: Buyer to verify sqft. Agents please share the virtual media! Please include that Michael Nerby has ownership interest in the property.

Freshly painted interiors, featuring a neutral palette that compliments any decor style. A private backyard oasis, ideal for outdoor gatherings and play. A detached garage for parking or additional storage. This Oak Park gem is not only a wonderful place to call home but also an investment in the vibrant and growing real estate market of the area. Don't miss the opportunity to make this charming property your own.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Location, Location, Location, and the location of this charming North Oak Park bungalow cannot be beaten. You'll have easy access to all of the city's amenities and freeways but still have the quiet comforts of home. Start your morning on the front porch with a cup of coffee from the custom coffee bar, or start your morning with a quick walk to Old Soul for a cup of coffee. The open-concept living area is one of a kind. The custom kitchen with updated cabinets, appliances, and quartz countertops is one of the largest in the area. You'll appreciate the charm of this 1920s bungalow, like the hardwood floors and basement for storage, and enjoy the modern amenities such as dual pane windows, central HVAC system, appliances, and a recently replaced water heater. You'll be less than a mile away from the UC Davis Medical Center. The neighborhood is poised for more growth with the upcoming Aggie Square, one of Sacramento's most innovative hubs, bringing together university, industry, and community. This lot is over 5,000 square feet, and the backyard is a blank canvas waiting for you to design the oasis of your dreams.
Confidential Remarks: Please submit lender pre-approval with offer.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Step into the charm of this classic high water bungalow located in the desirable North Oak Park neighborhood, just blocks away from UC Davis Med Center and the vibrant scenes of the Alhambra Triangle. This home offers 3 generously sized bedrooms, each with ample closet storage, paired with 2 full bathrooms. This dwelling seamlessly combines modern elegance with classic details, featuring craftsman molding and a built-in buffet cabinet. The heart of the home is the open, spacious kitchen which features abundant storage and a cozy breakfast nook. The bathrooms maintain a timeless appeal while providing all the comforts of modern living. The entire home is bathed in natural light, enhancing the welcoming indoor spaces, which also include the convenience of an indoor laundry room. Outside, the front yard features wild yet meticulously manicured landscaping, creating a picturesque entry. The backyard is a tranquil retreat, centered around a stunning fruitless Mulberry tree that provides ample shade. This naturalistic setting is a gardener's dream and a perfect backdrop for hosting gatherings or enjoying peaceful solitude. Additionally, the property boasts a generous basement, offering extensive storage space. This property is dialed, come see what 43rd Street has to offer!
Confidential Remarks: Vacant, text agent then go and show, lockbox on gas meter front of property. Do not use showing time to schedule. Offers if an due by Monday 5/6 at 3PM. Escrow pre opened with First American Title. Disclosures available upon request, roof and pest report attached. All raised garden beds, wine barrels and trellises are included in sale. Washer/dryer, garden furniture, composters and pots do not convey. Please lock all doors on your way out. Thanks for showing!
Directions to Property: West on 2nd Ave, South on 43rd St

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to the third Summerhouse Project on this street, your dream home built with you in mind. This stunning modern farmhouse-style property boasts a beautiful combination of colonial style brick and siding, with a wood fence and low-maintenance turf lawn perfect for outdoor living. Step outside and you'll find a spacious patio in the back, perfect for relaxing or entertaining guests. Inside, luxury vinyl waterproof plank flooring and Calcutta Quartz countertops add to the home's luxurious feel. The spacious kitchen features a large island perfect for entertaining guests or cooking with family. But that's not all - this property also features a finished basement with endless possibilities, waiting for your personal touch. The finished basement gives home an additional 820 sqft of living space! Additionally, there's an ADU (another 380 sq ft) with its own bathroom, providing an ideal space for guests or family!!! With 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, this property has plenty of space for you and your family. With attention to every detail, this property truly is the perfect place to call home. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make it yours.
Confidential Remarks: Text Steven for inspection reports. Home appraised at $560,000. Buyer to verify Sq Ft.
